entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon except 40 near Bowen Island. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
